content: विपरीत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Reversed, inverted. {@--2@} Contrary, opposite, reverse, inverse; <ls>R. 2. 53.</ls> {@--3@} Wrong, contrary to rule. {@--4@} False, untrue; <ls>Bv. 2 177.</ls> {@--5@} Unfavourable, adverse. {@--6@} Cross, acting in an opposite manner. {@--7@} Disagreeable, inauspicious. --तः A particular mode of sexual enjoyment. --ता {@--1@} An unchaste or faithless wife. {@--2@} A perverse woman.
